name: ProductPageLocaleDetail
desc: The product page locale metadata on App Store Connect.

items.name: adamId
items.desc: The adamId used in your campaign. Use Get a Campaign or Get All Campaigns to obtain your adamId.

items.name: appName
items.desc: The app name on App Store Connect.

items.name: appPreviewDeviceWithAssets
items.desc: A map between the device and available app preview details for that device.

items.name: deviceClasses
items.desc: The device classes assigned to a custom product page on App Store Connect.

items.name: language
items.desc: The language associated with the ISO alpha-2 country code, such as US.

items.name: languageCode
items.desc: The ISO 639-1 language code appended to the ISO alpha-2 country code, such as en-US.

items.name: productPageId
items.desc: A unique string to identify a product page on App Store Connect. For example, 45812c9b-c296-43d3-c6a0-c5a02f74bf6e.

items.name: promotionalText
items.desc: Text that appears at the top of the main description of a product page.

items.name: shortDescription
items.desc: Concise, informative text used on a product page to describe an app.

items.name: subTitle
items.desc: A summary of an app on a product page that appears below the name of an app.
